turns.text: And now that I have my eyes corrected to the point that I can see the delicate part of china painting I do enjoy it
turns.label: sd

turns.text: How did you ever get into that That sounds so interesting
turns.label: qw

turns.text: My husband kept begging me and hes been dead now for twenty years so you understand that this was long time ago But he finally brought me the china the book the brushes and he said I have made arrangements for your lessons
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I said Ill do it for three months and if I dont like it thats it Well I painted an awful lot until his death which was several years And it has just been the most relaxing enjoyable self-satisfying thing Ive had I -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Now do you do it just for yourself or do you do it to give as gifts or do you actually sell it
turns.label: qy

turns.text: I have sold quite bit I give lot to our two daughters that are grown and have their home and then I just have the rest of my house with lot of hand painting in it uh-huh
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh that sounds mar- - now do you work outside of the home
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Its great hobby but dont retire
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well see I dont - I never uh returned to work for the - - I have stayed home for about the last nine years
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Weve transferred around and our last area was in rural section right on the lake uh on Lake Erie So the lake life appealed to me and my husbands working and he left it up to me if I worked or not
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So in my spare time I love to sew There arent too many people around anymore that really enjoy sewing but I do make all my own clothes and we recently purchased new home so I enjoy doing my uh toppers for my window applications --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and things like that But uh just when I thought I really enjoyed my hobby yours sounds great
Well my sister is the seamstress of the two of us And but she doesnt china paint so we both have our expertise side
turns.label: sd

turns.text: What part of Ohio are you in
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Were in the sub- Im in the suburb of Cleveland and Im about uh fifteen miles probably from downtown Cleveland something like that And Cleveland is located right on Lake Erie and prior to this we were fifty miles west from here So we were right on the lake And Cleveland isnt all as bad as what youve heard
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And you do find people uh into the crafts and the things that uh various things for spare time but I have never heard and I have actually never run into anyone into the china painting and Im just intrigued with it
turns.label: sd

turns.text: If you ever start be sure and start with large piece that you can I mean large flat plate Um that way you can get the feel of - youre not cramped on these smaller objects
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Right where youre getting into the delicate work
turns.label: b

turns.text: Now do you where did you first get your lessons from
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Through uh an adult ed or strictly china type
turns.label: qy^d

turns.text: She just taught china painting uh-huh and -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Then then we had so much fun there I had friend from Albany which is about thirty-six miles away and we would meet every Thursday morning at our instructors home because she did our firing for us and she would help us and we bought lots of equipment from her supplies and it was just such delightful time And then after I -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: It must be so nice for you now that youre retired
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I have been little bit negligent about it because I was so tired when I had to go to work after my husbands death So I have put it aside for little while but Im I have just found me an instructor to get started again uh-huh
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh isnt that great And youll probably really uh re- regain your enthusiasm for it --
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- once you get into class again
Of course I just have one beautiful - with peonies uh umbrella stand and I have two daughters and theyre both -
turns.label: sd
